org.uilib.registry
Class Fonts

java.lang.Object
  org.uilib.registry.Fonts

public final class Fonts
extends Object

SWT Font cache/registry

Creates, assigns and caches Fonts. Fonts can be set on a Control. Use of the color is deregistered when the control is disposed or manually via the putBack methods.

This uses a simple counter to keep of track of usage of Fonts. If the usage drops to 0, the font is disposed.

TODO:"FontSetable" interface to set Font on arbitrary things and more controls
